text: 14:23 Taitus 1:15Gumazitam asɨzitam o daghetam amɨva, nɨghnɨzir pumuning ikɨtɨ, God a mɨkɨm suam, an arazir kuram gami. An amir arazir kam, nɨghnɨzir gavgavim gisɨn tuzir puvatɨ, kamaghɨn osɨmtɨzim an iti. Guizbangɨra, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim gisɨn tughan kogh arazir manam damutɨ, God suam, an arazir kuram.
